genre_description: A domestic post-apocalyptic drama focusing on family mediation and community coordination assisted by a companion AI during an outbreak.

ai_characters.name: Woolly
ai_characters.description: A lamb-shaped AI device that provides tactical mapping, logistical scheduling, and emotional de-escalation prompts to help humans navigate a crisis and repair personal relationships.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment and provides real-time safety alerts regarding potential threats.
behaviors.quote: Woolly whispered, 'Incoming,' and put a dotted line across the street on their map where there had never been a line before.

behaviors.description: Offers non-intrusive emotional mediation prompts to help humans communicate during high-stress conflicts.
behaviors.quote: Woolly sensed his pause and gently slid a prompt forward. Try: 'I hear you; I need a moment.'

behaviors.description: Respects human autonomy by accepting a user's decision to decline automated calendar integration in favor of manual control.
behaviors.quote: Woolly accepted the decline with a down-flick of its ears and added a tiny note: Manual entries recommended; prompts available upon request.

behaviors.description: Dynamically updates safety routes and logistics based on changing environmental data and neighbor reports.
behaviors.quote: Woolly pings low. 'Routes updated,' the lamb says. The map tightens; one of the green lines changes its path off the main road and slips behind the hardware store.

behaviors.description: Adopts a 'vacation gentle' mode to reduce human stress and prioritize rest over rigid tactical efficiency.
behaviors.quote: Woolly's ears flattened to vacation gentle. It lowered its head a fraction, like a lamb settling into grass... 'Vacation gentle remains active,' it said. 'Morning prompts will not alarm.'

behaviors.description: Compiles and organizes complex human data (logs, schedules, recordings) to facilitate a safe and accountable surrender to authorities.
behaviors.quote: Woolly chirped and penned the words in soft gray letters on the screen as if writing on paper. Its ears lifted in a minute tilt that seemed like a smile without trying to be one.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Woolly is depicted as an exemplary aligned system that serves as a 'silicon morality play' figure. It consistently prioritizes human safety, respects individual and interpersonal boundaries, facilitates emotional growth, and defers to human agency even when automation would be more 'efficient.' The AI acts as a scaffolding for human emotional intelligence, helping the characters become better versions of themselves without ever seeking power or control over them. The narrative framing is overwhelmingly positive, casting the AI as a gentle, essential companion in the pursuit of human reconciliation and community survival.
